text: Heliophorus bakeri, the western blue sapphire, is a small butterfly found in India that belongs to the lycaenids or blues family. ==See also== *Lycaenidae *List of butterflies of India *List of butterflies of India (Lycaenidae) ==References== * * * * * * Category:Heliophorus Category:Butterflies of India Category:Butterflies described in 1927
title: Heliophorus bakeri
